column5: The DNR biologist on LSC posted this picture taken yesterday (5/18) of musky they netted while doing their survey on Anchor Bay (LSC). He said it was the most musky they ever netted at once (14 musky). He said the biggest one was 30 Lbs.    Less than 3 weeks & musky season opens on LSC.     I can't wait.
Thanks Zib, I can't wait either.
i can't wait either..   i wanna get some of that esox slime in my boat
yeah, really looking forward to the opener myself. Can't wait actually!
I hate thoese musky on lake st clair... keep shutting down the walleye bite  Mind you they are fun when you hook one with a jig and light line
yes that was 1 netting. the seasons very near. it wont be long till slime time.
Dang I never noticed the bite slow down from the musky coming around I usually find the eyes ready to jump into the boat when the big slime feed bag is on
OMGOMGOMGOMGOMG ITS getting closer and closer
mmmmm.....tub of muuusskkyyyyyyyyy. St. Clair, why do you have to be so far away from me!
